trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationLocationCollection> class to iterate through a collection of <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationLocation> objects, which represent the resources for which location-specific configuration settings are defined.
trans-unit.target: 사용 하 여는 <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationLocationCollection> 의 컬렉션을 반복 하는 클래스 <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationLocation> 개체를 특정 위치 구성 설정이 정의 된 리소스를 나타냅니다.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationLocationCollection> is the type returned by the <xref:System.Configuration.Configuration.Locations%2A> property.

The <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationLocationCollection> class might not reference the collection of <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationLocation> objects in the order that they are specified in the configuration file.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationLocationCollection> 클래스의 컬렉션을 참조 하지 수 <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationLocation> 구성 파일에 지정 된 순서로 개체입니다.

trans-unit.source: In the following code example, the Web configuration for the application `MySampleApp` is loaded, and the locations defined in this configuration are displayed by iterating through the <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationLocationCollection> object returned by the <xref:System.Configuration.Configuration.Locations%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 다음 코드 예제에서는 응용 프로그램에 대 한 웹 구성에서에서 `MySampleApp` 로드 되 고 반복 하 여이 구성에 정의 된 위치가 표시 됩니다는 <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationLocationCollection> 에서 반환 된 개체는 <xref:System.Configuration.Configuration.Locations%2A> 속성입니다.

trans-unit.source: The index location of the <see cref="T:System.Configuration.ConfigurationLocationCollection" /> to return.
Gets the <see cref="T:System.Configuration.ConfigurationLocationCollection" /> object at the specified index.

Use the <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationLocationCollection.Item%2A> accessor to the <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationLocationCollection> class to get a specific <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationLocation> object from the collection by specifying its index within the collection.
trans-unit.target: 사용 하 여는 <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationLocationCollection.Item%2A> 접근자는 <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationLocationCollection> 가져올 특정 클래스를 <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationLocation> 컬렉션 내에서 해당 항목이 있는 인덱스를 지정 하 여 컬렉션에서 개체입니다.
